<!DOCTYPE html>

<html lang="en">

<head>

  <meta charset="UTF-8">

  <title>Element Test Sandbox</title>

  <style>

    body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; margin: 2em; }

    select, button { margin: 0.5em; }

    #result { margin-top: 1em; font-weight: bold; }

  </style>

</head>

<body>

  <h2>Element Test Sandbox</h2>


  <label>Choose Element:

    <select id="elementSelect">

      <option>Hydrogen</option>

      <option>Oxygen</option>

      <option>Nitrogen</option>

      <option>Sodium</option>

      <option>Copper</option>

      <option>Iron</option>

    </select>

  </label>


  <label>Choose Test:

    <select id="testSelect">

      <option value="flameTest">Flame Test</option>

      <option value="solubilityTest">Solubility Test</option>

      <option value="reactivityTest">Reactivity Test</option>

    </select>

  </label>


  <button onclick="runTest()">Run Test</button>


  <div id="result"></div>


  <script>

    const resultsDB = {

      Hydrogen: {

        flameTest: ["Pale blue flame", "Invisible flame"],

        solubilityTest: ["Highly soluble in water"],

        reactivityTest: ["Explodes with oxygen", "Forms water"]

      },

      Oxygen: {

        flameTest: ["No distinct color"],

        solubilityTest: ["Slightly soluble in water"],

        reactivityTest: ["Supports combustion"]

      },

      Nitrogen: {

        flameTest: ["No color flame"],

        solubilityTest: ["Low solubility"],

        reactivityTest: ["Generally inert"]

      },

      Sodium: {

        flameTest: ["Bright yellow flame"],

        solubilityTest: ["Soluble in water"],

        reactivityTest: ["Reacts violently with water"]

      },

      Copper: {

        flameTest: ["Green flame"],

        solubilityTest: ["Forms blue solution"],

        reactivityTest: ["Reacts with oxygen to form black oxide"]

      },

      Iron: {

        flameTest: ["Sparks in flame"],

        solubilityTest: ["Insoluble in water"],

        reactivityTest: ["Rusts slowly with oxygen"]

      }

    };


    function runTest() {

      const element = document.getElementById("elementSelect").value;

      const test = document.getElementById("testSelect").value;

      const possibleResults = resultsDB[element][test];

      const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * possibleResults.length);

      const result = possibleResults[randomIndex];

      document.getElementById("result").innerText =

        `${element} (${test}): ${result}`;

    }

  </script>

</body>

</html>
